201.name: 1st Anniversary Pack
201.desc:
A limited 1st Anniversary Pack. Contains the following items:

· Immediate access to Angela Announcer
· 3★ Guarantee Decaextraction Ticket x1
· Identity Takeoff Ticket x1

※ If you have already obtained the Angela Announcer, acquire x50 Thread Crates instead.
※ Identity Takeoff Ticket raises an Identity’s level to up to 40, and Uptie Tier up to Tier 4.

999.name: Limbus Pass
999.desc:
Upgrades the Battle Pass into the Limbus Pass.

※ Only applies for the current season’s pass.

202.name:
Full Moon 2024
Commemorative
ID Upgrade Pack
202.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2024 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Takeoff Module - ID Uptie x1
· Identity Training Ticket IV x80

※ Using the Takeoff Module - ID Uptie raises the selected Identity's Uptie Tier to 4.

203.name:
Full Moon 2024
Commemorative
E.G.O Upgrade Pack
203.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2024 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Decaextraction Ticket x3
· Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] x1

※ Using the Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] raises the selected E.G.O's Threadspinning tier to 4. (Usable only on E.G.Os WAW Level or lower)

204.name:
Full Moon 2024
Commemorative
Complete Pack
204.desc:
A limited Full Moon 2024 Campaign Commemorative Pack. Contains the following items:

· Decaextraction Ticket x4
· Takeoff Module - ID Uptie x1
· Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] x1
· Identity Training Ticket IV x80
· Threads x100

※ Using the Takeoff Module - ID Uptie raises the selected Identity's Uptie Tier to 4.

※ Using the Takeoff Module - E.G.O Spinning [WAW] raises the selected E.G.O's Threadspinning tier to 4. (Usable only on E.G.Os WAW Level or lower)
